Class ContatoController

java.lang.Object
br.com.willian.clientes.controller.ContatoController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/contato") public class ContatoController extends Object
Controller responsável pelo gerenciamento de contatos.

      @GetMapping("/listarPorCliente") public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Contato> listarPorCliente(@RequestParam Long idCliente, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
